00007 using System;
00008 using System.Linq;
00009 using System.Collections.Generic;
00010 using System.Text;
00011 
00012 namespace Msdn.UIFramework
00013 {
00014     public sealed class VisualCollection : List<UIElement>
00015     {
00016         private Dictionary<string, int> nameList;
00017         private Canvas canvas;
00018 
00019         public VisualCollection()
00020         {
00021             //this.host = host;
00022             this.nameList = new Dictionary<string, int>();
00023         }
00024 
00025         public VisualCollection(Canvas canvas)
00026         {
00027             this.canvas = canvas;
00028             this.nameList = new Dictionary<string, int>();
00029         }
00030 
00031         public T Add<T>(Func<T> build)
00032         {
00033             T element = build();
00034             this.Add(element as UIElement);
00035             return element;
00036         }
00037 
00038         public new void Add(UIElement element)
00039         {
00040             if (element.Name != "")
00041             {
00042                 nameList.Add(element.Name, this.Count);
00043             }
00044             element.Parent = canvas;
00045             element.Invalidate += new EventHandler(element_Invalidate);
00046             base.Add(element);
00047         }
00048 
00049         void element_Invalidate(object sender, EventArgs e)
00050         {
00051             // Pass invalidation event to the canvas          
00052             canvas.InvalidateChild(sender as UIElement);
00053         }
00054 
00055         public UIElement this[string name]
00056         {
00057             get
00058             {
00059                 return this[nameList[name]];
00060             }
00061         }
00062 
00063        
00064 
00065 
00066     }
00067 }
